name: Lightsaber Masta VR
description:
Long time ago in far away galaxy…

Just kidding 

But imagine yourself standing in magnet boots on top of the spaceship, reading galaxy, equipped with 2 lightsabers with built-in rail-guns, hearing this alien synth sound alarming you about the drones coming up in different shapes and styles. Be the masta of your sabers and your people.
Protect yourself and protect them.

Good luck!
